00056     void MeshGenerator::CreateBoxMesh(const String& MeshName, const String& MaterialName, const Vector3& HalfExtents)
00057     {
00058         Vector3 Half = HalfExtents;
00059         Ogre::MaterialPtr TheMaterial = Ogre::MaterialManager::getSingleton().getByName(MaterialName);
00060         String GroupName = TheMaterial->getGroup();
00061 
00062         Ogre::ManualObject* box = new Ogre::ManualObject("TempMan");
00063         box->begin(MaterialName);
00064         //Front
00065         box->position(-Half.X,-Half.Y,Half.Z);  box->normal(0,0,1);  box->textureCoord(0,1);
00066         box->position(Half.X,-Half.Y,Half.Z);   box->normal(0,0,1);  box->textureCoord(1,1);
00067         box->position(Half.X,Half.Y,Half.Z);    box->normal(0,0,1);  box->textureCoord(1,0);
00068         box->position(-Half.X,Half.Y,Half.Z);   box->normal(0,0,1);  box->textureCoord(0,0);
00069         //Back
00070         box->position(Half.X,-Half.Y,-Half.Z);  box->normal(0,0,-1); box->textureCoord(0,1);
00071         box->position(-Half.X,-Half.Y,-Half.Z); box->normal(0,0,-1); box->textureCoord(1,1);
00072         box->position(-Half.X,Half.Y,-Half.Z);  box->normal(0,0,-1); box->textureCoord(1,0);
00073         box->position(Half.X,Half.Y,-Half.Z);   box->normal(0,0,-1); box->textureCoord(0,0);
00074         //Left
00075         box->position(-Half.X,-Half.Y,-Half.Z); box->normal(-1,0,0); box->textureCoord(0,1);
00076         box->position(-Half.X,-Half.Y,Half.Z);  box->normal(-1,0,0); box->textureCoord(1,1);
00077         box->position(-Half.X,Half.Y,Half.Z);   box->normal(-1,0,0); box->textureCoord(1,0);
00078         box->position(-Half.X,Half.Y,-Half.Z);  box->normal(-1,0,0); box->textureCoord(0,0);
00079         //Right
00080         box->position(Half.X,-Half.Y,Half.Z);   box->normal(1,0,0);  box->textureCoord(0,1);
00081         box->position(Half.X,-Half.Y,-Half.Z);  box->normal(1,0,0);  box->textureCoord(1,1);
00082         box->position(Half.X,Half.Y,-Half.Z);   box->normal(1,0,0);  box->textureCoord(1,0);
00083         box->position(Half.X,Half.Y,Half.Z);    box->normal(1,0,0);  box->textureCoord(0,0);
00084         //Top
00085         box->position(-Half.X,Half.Y,Half.Z);   box->normal(0,1,0);  box->textureCoord(0,1);
00086         box->position(Half.X,Half.Y,Half.Z);    box->normal(0,1,0);  box->textureCoord(1,1);
00087         box->position(Half.X,Half.Y,-Half.Z);   box->normal(0,1,0);  box->textureCoord(1,0);
00088         box->position(-Half.X,Half.Y,-Half.Z);  box->normal(0,1,0);  box->textureCoord(0,0);
00089         //Bottom
00090         box->position(-Half.X,-Half.Y,-Half.Z); box->normal(0,-1,0); box->textureCoord(0,1);
00091         box->position(Half.X,-Half.Y,-Half.Z);  box->normal(0,-1,0); box->textureCoord(1,1);
00092         box->position(Half.X,-Half.Y,Half.Z);   box->normal(0,-1,0); box->textureCoord(1,0);
00093         box->position(-Half.X,-Half.Y,Half.Z);  box->normal(0,-1,0); box->textureCoord(0,0);
00094 
00095         box->triangle(0,1,2);    box->triangle(0,2,3);    //Front
00096         box->triangle(4,5,6);    box->triangle(4,6,7);    //Back
00097         box->triangle(8,9,10);   box->triangle(8,10,11);  //Left
00098         box->triangle(12,13,14); box->triangle(12,14,15); //Right
00099         box->triangle(16,17,18); box->triangle(16,18,19); //Top
00100         box->triangle(20,21,22); box->triangle(20,22,23); //Bottom
00101 
00102         box->end();
00103         Ogre::MeshPtr boxmesh = box->convertToMesh(MeshName, GroupName);
00104         boxmesh->_setBounds(Ogre::AxisAlignedBox(-Half.X,-Half.Y,-Half.Z,Half.X,Half.Y,Half.Z));
00105         Real FirstCheck = Half.X > Half.Y ? Half.X : Half.Y;
00106         Real Largest = FirstCheck > Half.Z ? FirstCheck : Half.Z;
00107         boxmesh->_setBoundingSphereRadius(1.4 * Largest);
00108         delete box;
00109     }

00116     void MeshGenerator::CreateSphereMesh(const String& MeshName, const String& MaterialName, const Real& Radius, const Real& Rings, const Real& Segments)
00117     {
00118         Ogre::MaterialPtr TheMaterial = Ogre::MaterialManager::getSingleton().getByName(MaterialName);
00119         String GroupName = TheMaterial->getGroup();
00120 
00121         Real RingAngle = (Ogre::Math::PI / Rings);
00122         Real SegAngle = (2 * Ogre::Math::PI / Segments);
00123         Whole VertIndex = 0;
00124 
00125         Ogre::ManualObject* sphere = new Ogre::ManualObject("TempMan");
00126         sphere->begin(MaterialName);
00127 
00128         for( Whole ring = 0 ; ring <= Rings ; ring++ ) {
00129         Real r0 = Radius * sinf (ring * RingAngle);
00130         Real y0 = Radius * cosf (ring * RingAngle);
00131 
00132             // Generate the group of segments for the current ring
00133             for( Whole seg = 0 ; seg <= Segments ; seg++ ) {
00134                 Real x0 = r0 * sinf(seg * SegAngle);
00135                 Real z0 = r0 * cosf(seg * SegAngle);
00136 
00137                 // Add one vertex to the strip which makes up the sphere
00138                 sphere->position( x0, y0, z0);
00139                 sphere->normal(Ogre::Vector3(x0, y0, z0).normalisedCopy());
00140                 sphere->textureCoord((Real) seg / (Real) Segments, (Real) ring / (Real) Rings);
00141 
00142                 if (ring != Rings) {
00143                     // each vertex (except the last) has six indicies pointing to it
00144                     sphere->index(VertIndex + Segments + 1);
00145                     sphere->index(VertIndex);
00146                     sphere->index(VertIndex + Segments);
00147                     sphere->index(VertIndex + Segments + 1);
00148                     sphere->index(VertIndex + 1);
00149                     sphere->index(VertIndex);
00150                     VertIndex++;
00151                 }
00152             }
00153         }
00154 
00155         sphere->end();
00156         Ogre::MeshPtr spheremesh = sphere->convertToMesh(MeshName, GroupName);
00157         spheremesh->_setBounds(Ogre::AxisAlignedBox(-Radius,-Radius,-Radius,Radius,Radius,Radius));
00158         spheremesh->_setBoundingSphereRadius(Radius);
00159         delete sphere;
00160     }
00161 }
00162
